name: showAiInputOutput
description: Display the actual LLM inputs and/or outputs captured during test execution. Match when intent references AI I/O, inputs and outputs, or similar phrases. When neither input nor output is explicitly specified, default to showing only outputs.

showInput.description: Set to true when the intent mentions inputs, input data, or uses phrases like 'inputs and outputs' or 'I/O'

showOutput.description: Set to true when the intent mentions outputs, output data, results, or uses phrases like 'inputs and outputs' or 'I/O'
